## Failure.getValueOrDefault() method

Gets the value associated with a successful [result](./ts-utils.iresult.md)<!-- -->, or a default value if the corresponding operation failed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getValueOrDefault(dflt?: T): T | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dflt | T | The value to be returned if the operation failed (default is <code>undefined</code>). |

<b>Returns:</b>

T \| undefined

The return value, if the operation was successful. Returns the supplied default value or `undefined` if no default is supplied.
